venue.address_1: Carter St opp Commuter Rail Station
venue.name: Waltham Station parking lot

item.description:
***Important note:  I only go to the station lot if someone has RSVP'd and is looking for a carpool.  Otherwise I do the lazy and go straight to the stadium from my house.***

I've always wanted to do this ever since my neighbor told me about it. 37 sections. 1147 giant steps.  Probably 1400' vertical gain for you mountaineers.  I'm leaving Waltham center at 6am. Email me if you'd like to carpool; I've got room for 4 more.
http://november-project.com/stadium/

If you come with me, bear in mind I have to be heading back to Waltham at 7:45, with a quick stop at Dunkin likely on the return.

Or if you just go to the stadium, look for me in the zebra striped hat.

I did this on November 7 and had a blast.  Long review describing what it was like is posted with that meetup:  http://www.meetup.com/Waltham-Trail-Runners/events/90192682/
item.name: Run Harvard Stadium steps with November Project
